inclusion.criterion: Tumor size 2 cm at ultrasound examination.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ER-negative tumors defined according to immunohistochemistry (i.e. < 10% of positive cells after immunostaining).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Multifocal and multicentric breast tumors are allowed if all foci are ER-negative.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Fixed and frozen samples from the primary tumor, obtained before treatment with epirubicin, must be available for evaluation of biological markers (topo II alpha gene and protein, HER-2 gene, p-53 gene, oligonucleotides microarrays).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent before study registration.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal CBC, hepatic and renal functions
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Normal left ventricular ejection fraction by echocardiography or muga scan
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Negative pregnancy test for all women of childbearing potential. Patients of childbearing potential must implement adequate non-hormonal measures to avoid pregnancy during treatment.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Serious medical conditions like: congestive heart failure or unstable angina pectoris, previous history of myocardial infarction within 1 year from study entry, uncontrolled arrhythmias.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of significant neurologic or psychiatric disorders
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: active peptic ulcer, unstable diabetes mellitus
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent treatment with hormonal replacement therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent treatment with any other anti-cancer therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Turner syndrome, short stature, delayed puberty and developmental delay. She is obese and mentally retarded.
